attributes.additional_details: It is cruel, it ruins horses life’s and it’s all for money and that is not right in any way , they pour acid on the horses hooves and burns there hair and skin, it’s unacceptable that the big lick is still allowed and legal in some countries
attributes.background: Make the big lick illegal , it is animal cruelty and it should not be allowed

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Governments in areas where soring takes place.
